mng: cup, trophy cup, classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
variant of 杯[bei1], trophy cup, classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

exm.mng: to drink a toast, Cheers! (proposing a toast), Here's to you!, Bottoms up!, lit. dry cup
to toast sb (with wine etc), to drink a toast
lit. a cup of soup, fig. to get part of the profits, one's share of the action
